posts.post_content:
I am looking for the following T206's with different backs.   Email me at [url]b.brownbaseball@verizon.net[/url] if you can help me out.  Thanks, Bill

O'Leary (Portrait)  SC 150 Fac 649, Sovereign 350, EPDG, Hindu
Wagner (Bat on Left Shoulder)  Sovereign 150, Sovereign 350, EPDG, Hindu
Wilhelm (Hands at Chest) Sovereign 150, Sovereign 350, EPDG

Delehanty (Louisville) Cycle 350, EPDG, Polar Bear, Tolstoi
Fiene (Throwing) American Beauty 350, Cycle 350, EPDG, Polar Bear, Tolstoi
Graham (St. Louis)  Sweet Caporal 350, Carolina Brights, Old Mill

Bradley (With Bat) American Beauty 350, American Beauty 460, Cycle 460, EPDG, Old Mill, Polar Bear, Tolstoi
Conroy (With Bat) Sovereign 350, American Beauty 460, Cycle 460, EPDG, Old Milll, Polar Bear, Tolstoi
Lake (St. Louis, No Ball) American Beauty 350, Cycle 460, EPDG, Polar Bear, Tolstoi
Pelty (Vertical) Sovereign 350, Cycle 460, EPDG, Polar
Wagner (Bat on Right Shoulder) American Beauty 350, American Beauty 460, Cycle 460, EPDG, Polar Bear

Ball (Cleveland)  American Beauty 460, Cycle 460, Old Mill, Polar Bear, Tolstoi
Devore Cycle 460, EPDG, Old Mill, Polar Bear
Sheckard (Glove Showing) Cycle 460, EPDG, Old Mill, Polar Bear
Hi- What different backs do you mean?
Just updated the list of backs that I need.  Hope you can help.  Thanks, Bill

Bill - Graded or raw? What grade level are you looking for?
Ray
